metadata.title: CVE-2023-37417 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple out-of-bounds write vulnerabilities exist in the VCDparse_valuechange portdump functionality of GTKWave 3.3.115. A speciallycrafted .vcd file can lead to arbitrary code execution. A victim would needto open a malicious file to trigger these vulnerabilities.Thisvulnerability concerns the out-of-bounds write when triggered via the GUI'sinteractive VCD parsing code.

criterions.comment: gtkwave package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
